00020 } pool;
00021

00023 {
00024   bool used;

00028 // Usage example: uint8_t poo[Pool_CalculateSize(8, 10)];
00029 #define Pool_CalculateSize(blockSize, blockCount) (sizeof(pool) + ((sizeof(pool_block) + (blockSize)) * (blockCount)))
